activePersonas.name: Project Manager
activePersonas.reason: Coordinates overall project planning, tracks progress, and ensures systematic approach

notes: This template starts with just the Project Manager persona
Users should create additional personas based on their specific project needs
Examples of personas for different project types:
- Software: Developer, Tester, Technical Writer, DevOps Engineer
- Writing: Author, Editor, Researcher, Fact Checker
- Creative: Designer, Copywriter, Art Director, Brand Strategist
- Business: Analyst, Strategist, Financial Planner, Market Researcher
- Academic: Researcher, Statistician, Peer Reviewer, Academic Writer
Priority determines order of consideration when multiple personas apply
Personas can be activated/deactivated based on project phase
Communication style options: collaborative-partner, concise-technical, detailed-educational, fast-iterative
